What's New:
The Minions explore Super Silly Fun Land in this new update!
- Discover the secrets of the New Environment
- New Secret Area: Ride a roller-coaster and collect Bananas!
- New Villain: Exclusive to the game, defeat the Villaintriloquist and his evil Puppet.
- Evil Minion: Drink the PX41 Serum and become an invincible, fast-running Evil Minion for a few seconds.
- New Costumes: Run dressed as an Astronaut or Tourist Minion!

Instructions:
1] Install the APK 
2] Unpack/Extract the ZIP file
3] Copy 'com.gameloft.android.ANMP.GloftASHM' folder to 'sdcard/Android/data'
4] Launch the game
5] Done, Enjoy :)
